findings.title: C2. Redundant errors
findings.description: The errors InvalidTick(), InvalidToken(), LowerEven() and UpperOdd() are never used in the ConcentratedLiquidityPool contract.

findings.title: Missing sanity checks in inputs of initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function of ConcentratedLiquidityPool contract lacks sanity checks on the decoded input data, allowing incorrect initialization without any warnings.

findings.title: Functions declared with Public Visibility but not used within the Contract should be made external
findings.description: The contract has a view function named getClaimableAmount which is used to get the value of AmountOut based on tokenID provided. The visibility of the function is public. However, it is not being called in the contract. It is only called externally.
